isis.stitle: FRONT NON-DRIVE STEERING AXLE: ROCKWELL - ASSEMBLE - TIE ROD ARMS, TIE ROD ENDS AND CROSS TUBE

svcproc.title: TIE ROD ARMS, TIE ROD ENDS AND CROSS TUBE

step1.para: Press the key in the slot in the arm ( Figure 38).
Install the tie rod arm in the knuckle ( Figure 38).

caution.para: Tighten the nuts to the specified torque. If the nuts are not tightened to the specified torque, the parts will be damaged.

step1.para: Install the nut on the tie rod arm. Tighten to the specified torque. Refer to the TORQUE CHART.
Install the cotter pins. Tighten nut until the holes are aligned. Do not loosen nut to install the cotter pin.

note.para: For detailed information on service of the tie rods and drag links, refer to GROUP 02 - FRONT AXLES, STEERING, GENERAL INFORMATION AND FRONT WHEEL ALIGNMENT in the CTS-5000 Master Service Manual.
The cross tube has right hand threads on one end and left hand threads on the other end. Make sure the ends are installed on the tube.

step1.para: If removed, install the tie rod ends on the cross tube to the position marked during removal ( Figure 39).

figure.caption: Figure 39. Install Tie Rod Ends on Cross Tube

step1.para: If new tie rod ends are installed, thread the ends equally on the cross tube to the required length.
Install the nuts and the bolts in the clamps. Tighten to the specified torque. Refer to the Torque Chart.

The rotating style clamp on the cross tube can be rotated for easier accessibility when installing the clamp bolt and nut. Tighten nut sufficiently to engage the locking element of the nut with the bolt. Clamp and tie rod end must be free to rotate ( Figure 40).
Connect the tie rod ends into the tie rod arms.
Install the nuts on the tie rod ends. Tighten to the specified torque. Refer to the Torque Chart .
Install the cotter pins. Tighten nut until the holes are aligned. Do not loosen nut to install the cotter pin.
Check and, if necessary, adjust the toe-in. Refer to GROUP 02 - FRONT AXLES, Steering General Information and Front Wheel Alignment in the CTS-5000 Master Service Manual.
